short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that helps you connect with recruiters while job searching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lexlink Recruiter Finder helps connect job seekers to recruiters by making it easy to find recruiter contact information while job searching.
